welcome.title: Registration successfully
welcome.checkMails: Check your mails and click on the link to verify your mail

callback.title: Login successful
callback.redirectTitle: We are loading your profile and forward you
callback.clickHereToRedirect: Click here to forward you faster
callback.sessionNotFound: We can't load your profile. Try to login again.

buttons.timeout: Wait some time before saving again

required.title: Password requirements:
required.subTitle: Ensure that these requirements are met:
required.minLength: Minimum 8 characters long - the more, the better
required.minLengthDesc: Your password needs to be 8 characters long or more
required.minLowercaseDesc: Your passwords needs at least one lowercase character
required.minUppercaseDesc: Your passwords needs at least one uppercase character
required.minNumberDesc: Your passwords needs at least one number
required.minSpecialCharDesc: Your passwords needs at least one special character

changed.wrongPassword: The password you entered was incorrect

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.subTitle: When you delete your account, you lose access to Front account services, and we permanently delete your personal data.You can cancel the deletion for 14 days.
delete.confirm: Confirm, that i want to delete my account
